Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Cup
Description: Coarsely manufacture black and red cup with flat base, straight mouth and simple lip. The inside surface, which is black, has been horizontally burnished, though its gloss has quite faded. The outside surface bears a pale red slip, except near the rim where is it black, and a design featuring pivoting punctuations ("dents de loup" or "wolf's teeth") near the top. The gloss of the burnish has also quite faded.
